## IApi.deviceRemoved property

An observable which emits disconnected Jabra devices. The emitted device object represents the device that has been disconnected. See [IDevice](./jabra-js.idevice.md) for more information.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
deviceRemoved: Observable<IDevice>;
```
